article_title: All Gov Bill Haslam Wants For Christmas Is Obamacare Expansion -- And Your Money

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: But one of the strangest claims Gov. Haslam has made in support of his Insure TN Obamacare expansion plan is that it would not “add any state cost to the budget.” This argument appears flimsy, and not only because Tennessee taxpayers also pay federal taxes.
